product_name: Kokatat Tropos Light Breeze Paddle Jacket - Women's
long_description: Kayakers, canoeists and rafters will appreciate this lightweight spray top with breathable, waterproof protection for all their paddling outings. Tropos Light is a soft 2-oz. nylon bonded to a waterproof, breathable coating shielding paddlers from wind, spray, sun and insects. Fully taped seams prevent water seepage; roomy cut allows comfortable layering underneath. Battened down with coated Lycra(R) spandex collar and wrist cuffs for a weatherproof seal against moisture entry. Adjustable bungee drawcord waist with cordlock fastens securely around waistline for a custom fit. Raglan sleeves allow maximum range of motion while paddling without binding during strokes. Small, self-draining zip patch pocket on left sleeve stows small items. A great choice for all types of paddling.
short_description: Kayakers, canoeists and rafters will appreciate this lightweight spray top with breathable, waterproof protection for all their paddling outings.
